name: Backrooms Reality Backup (FNAF)
description:
This game is an early demo of a huge project. I am planning to add more levels/animatronics in future. For now you have level 0 with Freddy. If you see green light - the exit is close.

Controls:

WASD - move

Ctrl - run

Left Shift - slow down (Why?)

Space - Jump

If you found vent - you finished demo.

Also thanks for the Freddy model: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/freddy-rigged-from-five-nights-at-freddys-vr-9a5...
